trends: There have been 126 other sightings in Indianapolis
There were no other sightings in Indianapolis on or around June 29th 2007
divs: Sighting DetailsMy boyfriend and I was driving down the road. I noticed a ball of fire in the sky. I thought it was a firework, but it wasn't it didn't go out. It was an overcast night, so there was just a wall of clouds. It was heading North on the east side of Indianapolis, then it changed and went West. We watched it for 4 mins. It started to go up, and then disappeared into the clouds. It was going about as fast as a airplane.
